XXbsu012_u:5: ekasmin samaye bhagavān janapadacaryāṃ caramāṇo 'nupūrveṇa yena vaiśālī mahānagarī tenānuprāpto 'bhūt |
XXbsu012_u:6: tatra khalu bhagavān vaiśālyāṃ viharati sma vādyasvaravṛkṣamūle mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham aṣṭabhirbikṣusahasraiḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadbhiś ca bodhisattvasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ rājāmātyabrāhmaṇagṛhapatisaṃhatyā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyaparṣadā ca parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma |
XXbsu012_u:7: atha khalu mañjuśrīr dharmarājaputro buddhānubhāvenotthāyāsanād ekaṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat - deśayatu bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ
XXbsu012_u:9: vayaṃ śrutvā sarvakarmāvaraṇāni viśodhayema paścime kāle paścime samaye saddharmapratirūpake vartamāne sattvānām anugraham upādāya |
XXbsu012_u:10: atha bhagavān mañjuśriye kumārabhūtāya sādhukāram adāt - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ,
XXbsu012_u:13: samādhesase(?) nānākarmāvaraṇenāvṛtānāṃ sattvānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ ca hitārthāya |
XXbsu012_u:14: tena hi tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye |
XXbsu012_u:18: asti mañjuśrīḥ pūrvasmin digbhāge ito buddhakṣetrād daśagaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇy atikramya vaidūryanirbhāsā nāma lokadhātuḥ |
XXbsu012_u:20: samyaksaṃbuddho viharati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiś ca śāstā devānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān| tasya khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya
XXbsu012_u:21: tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ carata imāni dvādaśa mahāpraṇidhānāny abhūvan |
XXbsu012_u:22: katamāni dvādaśa mahāpraṇidhānāni? prathamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt yadāham anāgate 'dhvani anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyam, tadā mama śarīraprabhayā
XXbsu012_u:24: yathā cāhaṃ dvātriṃśadbhir mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ, aśītibhiś cānuvyañjanair alaṃkṛtadehaḥ, tathaiva sarvasattvā bhaveyuḥ || (dvitīyaṃ
XXbsu012_u:25: tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate 'dhvani anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyam, tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me kāyaḥ anarghavaidūryamaṇir iva antarbahiratyantapariśuddho vimalaprabhāsaṃpannaḥ syāt |
XXbsu012_u:26: vipulakāyas tadupamena śriyā tejasā ca pratyupasthitaḥ syāt |
XXbsu012_u:27: tasyāṃśujālāni raviśaśikarānatikrameyuḥ te ca ye kecit sattvā lokadhātau jātāś ca, ye cāpi puruṣāḥ, te tamisrāyāṃ ratrāvandhakāre nānādiśaṃ gaccheyuḥ |
XXbsu012_u:28: sarvadikṣu mama ābhayāṃ spṛṣṭāḥ kuśalāni ca) karmāṇi kurvīran || tṛtīyaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - (BhgSū, Vaidya 166) yadāham anāgate - - - - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā
XXbsu012_u:29: aprameyaprajñopāyabalādhānena aparimāṇasya sattvadhātor akṣayāyopabhogāya paribhogāya syuḥ
XXbsu012_u:30: kasyaci(t) sattvasya kenacid vaikalyaṃ na syāt ||
XXbsu012_u:31: caturthaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāpto 'haṃ ye kumārgapratipannāḥ sattvāḥ śrāvakamārgapratipannāḥ pratyekabuddhamārgapratipannāś ca, te sattvā anuttare bodhimārge mahāyāne niyojayeran || pañcamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - -
XXbsu012_u:32: - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā mama śāsane brahmacaryaṃ careyuḥ, te sarve akhaṇḍaśīlāḥ syuḥ susaṃvṛtāḥ |
XXbsu012_u:33: mā ca kasyaci(t) śīlavipannasya mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā kvacid durgatigamanaṃ syāt || ṣaṣṭhaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā hīnakāyā vikalendriyā durvarṇā jaḍaiḍamūkā laṃgāḥ kubjāḥ śvitrāḥ kuṇḍā andhā badhirā unmattā ye cānye śarīrasthavyādhayaḥ, te mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā sarve sakalendriyāḥ suparipūrṇagātrā bhaveyuḥ ||
XXbsu012_u:34: saptamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye nānāvyādhiparipīḍitāḥ sattvā atrāṇā aśaraṇā
XXbsu012_u:35: bhaiṣajyopakaraṇavirahitā anāthā daridrā duḥkhitāḥ, sace(t) teṣāṃ mama nāmadheyaṃ karṇapuṭe nipatet, teṣāṃ sarvavyādhayaḥ praśameyuḥ, nīrogāś ca nirupadravāś ca te syur yāva bodhiparyavasānam || aṣṭamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā yaḥ kaścin mātṛgrāmo nānāśtrīdoṣaśataiḥ saṃkliṣṭaṃ strībhāvaṃ vijugupsitaṃ mātṛgrāmayoniṃ ca parimoktukāmo mama nāmadheyaṃ dhārayet, tasya mātṛgrāmasya na strībhāvo bhavet yāva bodhiparyavasānam || navamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt -
XXbsu012_u:36: yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāpte 'haṃ sarvasattvān mārapāśabandhanabaddhān nānādṛṣṭigahanasaṃkaṭaprāptān
XXbsu012_u:37: sarvamārapāśadṛṣṭigatibhyo vinivartya samyagdṛṣṭau niyojya ānupūrveṇa bodhisattvacārikāṃ saṃdarśayeyam || daśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūta -
XXbsu012_u:38: - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye kecit sattvā
XXbsu012_u:39: rājādhibhayabhītāḥ, ye vā bandhanabaddhāvaruddhāḥ vadhārhā anekamāyābhir upadrutā vimānitāś ca kāyikavācikacaitasikaduḥkhairabhyāhatāḥ, te mama nāmadheyasya śravaṇena madīyena puṇyānubhāvena ca sarvabhayopadravebhyaḥ
XXbsu012_u:40: parimucyeran || ekādaśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūta - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvāḥ kṣudhāgninā prajvalitāḥ āhārapānaparyeṣṭyabhiyuktāḥ tannidānaṃ pāpaṃ kurvanti, sace(t) te mam nāmadheyaṃ dhārayeyuḥ, ahaṃ teṣāṃ varṇagandharasopetena āhāreṇa śarīraṃ saṃtarpayeyam || dvādaśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye kecit sattvā vasanavirahitā daridrāḥ
XXbsu012_u:41: śītoṣṇadaṃśamaśakrairupadrutā rātriṃdivaṃ duḥkham anubhavanti, sace(t) te mama nāmadheyeṃ dhārayeyuḥ, ahaṃ teṣāṃ ca vastraparibhogam upasaṃhareyam,
XXbsu012_u:42: nānāraṅgai raktāṃś ca kāmānupanāmayeyam, (BhgSū, Vaidya 167) vividhaiś ca ratnābharaṇagandhamālyavilepanavādyatūryatālāvacaraiḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvābhiprāyān paripūrayeyam || imāni dvādaśa mahāpraṇidhānāni mañjuśrīḥ bhagavān bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvaṃ bodhicārikāṃ caran kṛtavān ||
XXbsu012_u:43: tasya khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya yat praṇidhānaṃ yac ca buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ tan na śakyaṃ kalpena vā kalpāvaśeṣeṇa vā kṣapayitum |
XXbsu012_u:44: suviśuddhaṃ tad buddhakṣetraṃ vyapagataśilāśarkarakaṭhalyam apagatakāmadoṣam apagatāpāyaduḥkhaśabdam apagatamātṛgrāmam |
XXbsu012_u:47: tatra vaidūryanirbhāsāyāṃ lokadhātau dvau bodhisattvau mahāsattvau teṣām aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pramukhau, ekakaḥ sūryavairocano nāma, dvitīyaś
XXbsu012_u:48: candravairocanaḥ, yau tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya saddharmakośaṃ dhārayataḥ |
XXbsu012_u:49: tasmāt tarhi mañjuśrīḥ śrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tatra buddhakṣetropapattaye praṇidhānaṃ karaṇīyam ||
XXbsu012_u:50: punaraparaṃ bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam āmantrayate sma - santi mañjuśrīḥ pṛthagjanāḥ sattvāḥ, ye na jānanti kuśalākuśalaṃ karma |
XXbsu012_u:51: te lobhābhibhūtā ajānanto dānaṃ dānasya ca mahāvipākam, bālāgramūrkhāḥ śraddhendriyavikalā dhanasaṃcayakṣaṇābhiyuktāḥ |
XXbsu012_u:52: na ca dānasaṃvibhāge teṣāṃ cittaṃ kramate |
XXbsu012_u:53: dānakāle upasthite svaśarīramaṃsacchedane iva vā manaso (duḥkhaṃ) bhavati |
XXbsu012_u:54: aneke ca sattvāḥ ye svayam eva na
XXbsu012_u:56: dāsadāsīkarmakarāṇām, prāgevānyeṣāṃ yācakānām, te tādṛśāḥ sattvā itaś cyutvā pretaloke upapatsyante tiryagyonau vā |
XXbsu012_u:57: yaiḥ pūrvaṃ manuṣyabhūtaiḥ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyam, tatra teṣāṃ yamalokasthitānāṃ tiryagyonisthitānāṃ vā tasya tathāgatasya nāma su(saṃ?)mukhībhaviṣyati |
XXbsu012_u:58: saha smaraṇamātreṇa ataś cyutvā punar api manuṣyaloke upapatsyante, jātismarāś ca bhaviṣyanti
XXbsu012_u:59: | te te durgatibhayabhītā na bhūyaḥ kāmaguṇebhir arthikā bhaviṣyanti,
XXbsu012_u:60: dānābhiratāś ca bhaviṣyanti dānasya ca varṇavādinaḥ |
XXbsu012_u:61: sarvam api parityāgenānupūrveṇa karacaraṇaśīrṣanayanaṃ ca māṃsaśoṇitaṃ (ca) yācakānām
XXbsu012_u:63: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ santi sattvāḥ ye tathāgatānuddiśya śikṣāpadāni dhārayanti, te śīlavipattim āpadyante, dṛṣṭivipattim ācāravipattiṃ vā
XXbsu012_u:65: śīlavipannā ye punaḥ śīlavanto bhavanti, śīlaṃ
XXbsu012_u:66: rakṣanti, na punar bahuśrutaṃ paryeṣyanti, na ca tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ
XXbsu012_u:68: ye ca punar buhuśrutāḥ, te ādhimānikā bhaviṣyanti mānastabdhāḥ, pareṣām īrṣyāparāyaṇāḥ saddharmam avamanyante pratikṣipanti |
XXbsu012_u:69: mārapakṣikās te tādṛḥā mohapuruṣāḥ svayaṃ kumārgapratipannāḥ |
XXbsu012_u:71: teṣām evaṃrūpāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ bhūyiṣṭhena narakavāsagatir bhaviṣyati |
XXbsu012_u:72: tatra (BhgSū, Vaidya 168) yais tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ ḥrutaṃ bhaviṣyanti, teṣāṃ tatra narake sthitānāṃ buddhānubhāvena tasya
XXbsu012_u:74: te tataḥ cyutvā punar api manuṣyaloke upapatsyante samyagdṛṣṭisaṃpannā vīryavantaḥ kalyāṇāḥayāḥ
XXbsu012_u:75: te gṛhān utsṛjya tathāgataḥāsane pravrajitvā ānupūrveṇa bodhisattvacārikāṃ paripūrayiṣyanti
XXbsu012_u:76: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ santi sattvāḥ ye ātmano varṇaṃ bhāṣante matsariṇaḥ,
XXbsu012_u:78: ātmotkarṣakaparapaṃsakāḥ sattvāḥ parasparasatkṛtvāḥ tryapāyeṣu bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi duḥkham
XXbsu012_u:79: | te anekavarṣasahasrāṇām atyayena tataś cyutvā gavāśvoṣṭragardabhādiṣu
XXbsu012_u:81: kaśādaṇḍaprahāreṇa tāḍitāḥ kṣuttarṣapīḍitaśarīrā mahāntaṃ bhāraṃ vahamānā mārgaṃ gacchanti
XXbsu012_u:82: yadi kadācit manuṣyajanmapratilābhaṃ pratilapsyante, te nityakālaṃ nīcakuleṣu
XXbsu012_u:84: yaiḥ pūrvaṃ manuṣyabhūtais tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati, te tena kuśalamūlena sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ
XXbsu012_u:85: parimokṣyante, tīkṣṇendriyāś ca bhaviṣyanti paṇḍitā vyaktā meghāvinaś ca |
XXbsu012_u:87: mārapāśam ucchidya avidyāṇḍakośaṃ bhindanti, kleśanadīm ucchoṣayanti,
XXbsu012_u:89: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ santi sattvāḥ ye paiśunyābhiratāḥ sattvānāṃ parasparaṃ kalahavigrahavivādān kārāpayanti |
XXbsu012_u:90: te parasparaṃ vigrahacittāḥ sattvā nānāvidhamakuśalam abhisaṃskurvanti kāyena vācā manasā, anyonyam ahitakāmā nityaṃ parasparam anarthāya parākrāmanti |
XXbsu012_u:91: te ca vanadevatām āvāhayanti vṛkṣadevatāṃ giridevatāṃ ca |
XXbsu012_u:95: tasya śatror nāma vā śarīrapratimāṃ vā kṛtvā tatra ghoravidyāṃ sādhayanti kākhordavetālānuprayogeṇa jīvitāntarāyaṃ vā śarīravināśaṃ vā kartukāmāḥ |
XXbsu012_u:96: yaiḥ punas tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati, teṣāṃ na śakyaṃ kenāntarāyaṃ kartum |
XXbsu012_u:97: sarve ca te parasparaṃ maitracittā hitacittā avyāpannacittāś ca viharanti svakasvakena parigraheṇa saṃtuṣṭāḥ ||
XXbsu012_u:98: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ etāś catasraḥ parṣado bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ,
XXbsu012_u:99: ye cānye śrāddhāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā āryāṣṭāṅgaiḥ samanvāgatā upavāsam upavasanti, ekavārṣikaṃ vā traimāsikaṃ vā śikṣāpadaṃ dhārayiṣyanti, yeṣām evaṃpraṇidhānam evamabhiprāyam - anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena paścimāyāṃ diśi sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau upapadyema
XXbsu012_u:101: yaiḥ punas tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati,
XXbsu012_u:102: teṣāṃ maraṇakālasamaye aṣṭau bodhisattvā ṛddhyāgatā upadarśayanti, te tatra nānāraṅgeṣu padmeṣūpapādukāḥ prādurbhaviṣyanti |
XXbsu012_u:105: kuśalamūlaṃ na kṣīyate, na ca durgatigamanaṃ bhaviṣyati |
XXbsu012_u:106: te tataś cyutvā iha manuṣyaloke upapatsyante |
XXbsu012_u:108: te anekāni sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyanti
XXbsu012_u:109: apare punaḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu prabhūtadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgārasamṛddheṣu ca kuleṣu upapatsyante |
XXbsu012_u:110: te rūpasaṃpannāś ca bhaviṣyanti, eśvaryasaṃpannāś ca bhaviṣyanti, parivārasaṃpannāś ca bhaviṣyanti |
XXbsu012_u:111: yaś ca mātṛgrāmaḥ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā
XXbsu012_u:112: udgrahīṣyati, tasya sa eva paścimaḥ strībhāvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ ||
XXbsu012_u:113: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantam etad avocat - ahaṃ bhagavan paścime kāle paścime samaye teṣāṃ śrāddhānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca
XXbsu012_u:114: tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrāvayiṣyāmi, antaśaḥ svapnāntaram api buddhanāmakaṃ karṇapuṭeṣu upasaṃhārayiṣyāmi |
XXbsu012_u:115: ye idaṃ sūtraratnaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti, parebhyo vistareṇa
XXbsu012_u:116: likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti, pustakagataṃ vā kṛtvā satkariṣyanti
XXbsu012_u:117: nānāpuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanachatradhvajapatākābhiḥ, tat pañcaraṅgikavastraiḥ pariveṣṭya śucau pradeśe sthāpayitavyam |
XXbsu012_u:118: yatraiva idaṃ sūtrāntaṃ sthāpitaṃ bhavati, tatra catvāro mahārājānaḥ saparivārāḥ,
XXbsu012_u:119: anyāni ca anekāni ca devakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi upasaṃkramiṣyanti |
XXbsu012_u:121: te ca bhagavan idaṃ sūtraratnaṃ prakāśayiṣyanti |
XXbsu012_u:122: tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistaravibhāgaṃ ca tasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti, teṣāṃ nākālamaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati |
XXbsu012_u:123: na teṣāṃ kenacit śakyamojo 'pahartum, hṛtaṃ vā ojaḥ punar api pratisaṃharati |
XXbsu012_u:124: bhagavān āha - etam etad mañjuśrīḥ, evam etat, yathā vadasi |
XXbsu012_u:125: yaś ca mañjuśrīḥ śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tasya tathāgatasya pūjāṃ
XXbsu012_u:126: kartukāmaḥ, tena tasya tathāgatasya pratimā kārāpayitavyā, sapta rātriṃdivam āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasamanvāgatena upavāsam upavasitavyam |
XXbsu012_u:127: śucinā śucim āhāraṃ kṛtvā śucau pradeśe (nānāpuṣpāṇi saṃstārya nānāgandhapradhūpite nānāvastracchatradhvajapatākāsamalaṃkṛte tasmin pṛthivīpradeśe susnātagātreṇa śucivimalavasanadhāriṇā nirmalacittena akaluṣacittena avyāpādacittena sarvasattveṣu maitracittena (upekṣācittena)
XXbsu012_u:129: nānātūryasaṃgītipravāditena sā tathāgatapratimā pradakṣiṇīkartavyā tasya tathāgatasya pūrṇapraṇidhānāni manasi kartavyāni |
XXbsu012_u:131: yaṃ cetayati, yaṃ prārthayati, taṃ sarvābhiprāyaṃ paripūrayati |
XXbsu012_u:132: yadi dirgham āyuḥ kāmayate, dirghāyuṣko bhavati |
XXbsu012_u:134: yadi aiśvaryam abhiprārthayate, tad alpakṛcchreṇa prāpnoti |
XXbsu012_u:137: ye iha pāpakaṃ svapnaṃ paśyanti, yatra vāyasaḥ sthito bhavati durnimittaṃ vā, yatra amaṅgalaśataṃ vā sthitaṃ bhavati,
XXbsu012_u:138: tais tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūjā kartavyā |
XXbsu012_u:140: (BhgSū, Vaidya 170) yeṣām agryudakaviṣaśasrapratāpacaṇḍahastisiṃhavyāghraṛkṣatarakṣudvīpikāśīviṣavṛścikaśatapadadaṃśamaśakādibhayaṃ bhavati, tais tasya tathāgatasya pūjā kartavyā |
XXbsu012_u:142: yeṣāṃ corabhayaṃ taskarabhayam, tais tasya tathāgatasya
XXbsu012_u:144: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ ye śrāddhāḥ kulaputrā va kuladuhitaro vā ye yāvajjīvaṃ triśaraṇam upagṛhṇanti, ananyadevatāś ca bhavanti, ye pañca śikṣāpadāni dhārayanti, ye ca bodhisattvasaṃvaraṃ caturvaraśikṣāpadaśataṃ
XXbsu012_u:145: dhārayanti, ye punar apiraṃ niṣkrāntagṛhavāsā bhikṣavaḥ, pañcādhike dve śikṣāpadaśate dhārayanti, yā bhikṣuṇyaḥ pañcaśataśikṣāpadāni dhārayanti,
XXbsu012_u:146: ye ca yathāparigṛhītāc chikṣāsaṃvarād anyatarāc chikṣāpadāt bhraṣṭā bhavanti saced durgatibhayabhītāḥ, tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayeyuḥ, na bhūyas teṣāṃ tryapāyagamanaduḥkhaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyam |
XXbsu012_u:147: yaś ca mātṛgrāmaḥ prasavanakāle tīvrāṃ duḥkhāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayati, yā tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyam
XXbsu012_u:148: anusmaret, pūjāṃ ca kuryāt, sā sukhaṃ ca prasūyate, sarvāṅgaparipūrṇaṃ putraṃ (ca) janayiṣyati abhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyas tīkṣṇendriyo buddhimān |
XXbsu012_u:149: sa ārogyasvalpābādho bhaviṣyati, na ca śakyate amanuṣyais tasya ojo 'pahartum ||
XXbsu012_u:150: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma - śraddadhāsi tvam ānanda pattīyasi yad ahaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya guṇān varṇayiṣyāmi? athavā te kāṅkṣā
XXbsu012_u:151: vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā atra gambhīre buddhagocare? athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat - na me bhadanta bhagavan atra kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā tathāgatabhāṣiteṣu sūtrānteṣu |
XXbsu012_u:152: tat kasya hetoḥ? nāsti tathāgatānām apariśuddhakāyavāṅbhanaḥsamudācāratā |
XXbsu012_u:153: imau bhagavan candrasūryau evaṃ maharddhikau evaṃ mahānubhāvau pṛthivyāṃ prapatetām, sa sumerur vā parvatarājaḥ sthānāc calet, na tu buddhānāṃ vacanam anyathā bhavet |
XXbsu012_u:154: kiṃ tu bhadanta santi sattvāḥ śraddhendriyavikalāḥ |
XXbsu012_u:155: idaṃ buddhagocaraṃ śrutvāṃ evaṃ vakṣyanti katham etan nāmadheyasmaraṇamātreṇa tasya tathāgatasya tāvanto guṇānuśaṃsā bhavanti? te na śraddadhanti na
XXbsu012_u:156: pattīyanti, pratikṣipanti| teṣāṃ dīrgharātram anarthāya na hitāya na
XXbsu012_u:159: yena tasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutam, tasya sattvasya durgatyapāyagamanaṃ bhavet, nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate |
XXbsu012_u:163: abhūmir atra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ sthāpayitvā ekajātipratibaddhān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān iti |
XXbsu012_u:164: durlabhaḥ ānanda manuṣyapratilābhaḥ, durlabhaṃ triratne śraddhāgauravam, sudurlabhaṃ tathāgatasya nāmadheyaśravaṇam |
XXbsu012_u:165: tasya bhagavatas tathāgatasya bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya ānanda bodhisattvacaryām apramāṇam, upāyakauśalyam apy apramāṇam, apramāṇaṃ cāsya praṇidhānaviśeṣavistaram |
XXbsu012_u:167: (BhgSū, Vaidya 171) kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā bodhisattvacārikāyāṃ vistaravibhaṅgaṃ nirdiśeyam |
XXbsu012_u:168: kṣīyeta ānanda alpam, na tv eva śakyaṃ tasya bhagavato
XXbsu012_u:170: tena khalu punaḥ samayena tasyām eva parṣadi trāṇamukto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃnipatito 'bhūt saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ |
XXbsu012_u:171: utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat - bhaviṣyanti bhadanta bhagavan sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye nānāvyādhiparipīḍitā
XXbsu012_u:173: rorudyamānebhir mitrajñātisālohitaiḥ parivāritā andhakārāṃ diśaṃ paśyanto yamapuruṣair ākarṣyamāṇāś ca |
XXbsu012_u:174: tasya kalevare mañcaśayite vijñānaṃ yamasya dharmarājasyāgratām upanīyate |
XXbsu012_u:175: yac ca tasya sattvasya sahajānubaddham eva yat kiṃcit tena puruṣeṇa kuśalam akuśalaṃ vā kṛtaṃ bhavati, tat sarvaṃ sulikhitaṃ kṛtvā yamasya dharmarājasya upanāmyate |
XXbsu012_u:177: dharmarājas taṃ pṛcchati, gaṇayati yathākṛtaṃ cāsya kuśalam akuśalaṃ vā
XXbsu012_u:179: tatra ye te mitrajñātisālohitāstasyāturasyārthāya taṃ bhagavantaṃ bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhaṃ tathāgataṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccheyuḥ,
XXbsu012_u:180: tasya ca tathāgatasya pūjāṃ kuryuḥ, sthānam etad vidyate yat tasya tad
XXbsu012_u:181: vijñānaṃ punar api pratinivarteta, svapnāntaragata ivātmānaṃ saṃjānīte |
XXbsu012_u:182: yadi vā saptame divase yadi vā (ekaviṃśatime) divase yadi vā
XXbsu012_u:183: pañcatriṃśatime divase yadi vā ekonapañcāśatime divase tasya vijñānaṃ punar api nivarteta, smṛtim upalabheta |
XXbsu012_u:184: tasya kuśalam akuśalaṃ vā karmavipākaṃ svayam eva pratyakṣaṃ bhavati |
XXbsu012_u:185: jñātvā sa jīvitahetau na kadāpi pāpam akuśalaṃ karma kariṣyati |
XXbsu012_u:186: tasmāc chrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūjā kartavyā ||
XXbsu012_u:187: athāyuṣmān ānandas trāṇamuktaṃ nāma bodhisattvam etad avocat - kathaṃ kulaputra tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya pūjā kartavyā?
XXbsu012_u:188: trāṇamukto bodhisattva āha - ye bhadanta ānanda mahato vyādhitaḥ parimocitukāmāḥ, tais tasyāturasyārthāya sapta divasāni āryāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upavasitavyam, bhikṣusaṃghasya ca āhārapānaiḥ sarvopakaraṇair yathāśakti pūjopasthānaṃ kartavyam |
XXbsu012_u:189: bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya nāmadheyaṃ triṣkṛtvā rātryāṃ triṣkṛtvā divase manasi kartavyam |
XXbsu012_u:193: ekaikayā pratimayā sapta sapta dīpāḥ prajvālayitavyāḥ |
XXbsu012_u:195: yadi ekonacatvāriṃśatime divase āloko na kṣīyate, veditavyaṃ sarvasaṃpaditi |
XXbsu012_u:197: punar aparaṃ bhadanta ānanda yeṣāṃ rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānām upadravā vā upasargā vā pratyupasthitā bhaveyuḥ, vyādhipīḍā vā svacakrapīḍā vā paracakrapīḍā vā nakṣatrapīḍā (BhgSū, Vaidya 172) vā candragrahasūryagrahapīḍā vā akālavātavṛṣṭipīḍā vā avagrahapīḍā vā
XXbsu012_u:198: samutthitā, amāṅgalyā vā saṃkrāmakavyādhir vā vipad vā samupasthitā, tena rājñā kṣatriyeṇa mūrdhābhiṣiktena sarvasattveṣu maitracittena bhavitavyam,
XXbsu012_u:200: tasya ca bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya yathāpūrvoktapūjā karaṇīyā
XXbsu012_u:201: tadā tasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya etena kuśalamūlena ca tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistareṇa tatra viṣaye kṣemaṃ bhaviṣyati subhikṣam |
XXbsu012_u:202: kālena vātavṛṣṭiśasyasaṃpado bhaviṣyanti, sarve ca viṣayanivāsinaḥ sattvā ārogāḥ sukhitāḥ pramodyabahulāḥ |
XXbsu012_u:203: na ca tatra viṣaye duṣṭayakṣarākṣasabhūtapiśācāḥ sattvānāṃ viheṭhayanti |
XXbsu012_u:205: tasya ca rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya āyurvarṇabalārogyaiśvaryābhivṛddhir bhaviṣyati
XXbsu012_u:206: athāyuṣmān ānandas trāṇamuktaṃ bodhisattvam evam avocat - kathaṃ kulaputra parikṣīṇāyuḥ punar evābhivivardhate? trāṇamukto bodhisattva āha - nanu tvayā bhadanta ānanda tathāgatasyāntikāc chrutam - santi akālamaraṇāni |
XXbsu012_u:215: caturtham akālamaraṇaṃ ye agnidāhena kālaṃ kurvanti |
XXbsu012_u:216: pañcamaṃ cākālamaraṇaṃ ye ca udakena mriyante |
XXbsu012_u:217: ṣaṣṭhakālamaraṇaṃ ye (siṃha)vyāghravyālacaṇḍamṛgamadhyagatā vāsaṃ kalpayanti mriyante ca
XXbsu012_u:220: navamam akālamaraṇaṃ ye kṣuttṛṣopahatā āhārapānam alabhamānā ārtāḥ kālaṃ kurvanti |
XXbsu012_u:223: atha khalu tatra parṣadi dvādaśa mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ saṃnipatitā abhūvan yaduta kiṃbhīro nāma mahāyakṣasenāpatiḥ, vajraś ca nāma
XXbsu012_u:224: mahāyakṣasenāpatiḥ, mekhilo nāma mahāyakṣasenāpatiḥ, antilo nāma mahāyakṣasenāpatiḥ, anilo nāma mahāyakṣasenāpatiḥ, saṇṭhilo nāma mahāyakṣasenāpatiḥ, indalo nāma mahāyakṣasenāpatiḥ, pāyilo nāma mahāyakṣasenāpatiḥ, mahālo nāma mahāyakṣasenāpatiḥ, cidālo nāma mahāyakṣasenāpatiḥ, caundhulo nāma mahāyakṣasenāpatiḥ, vikalo nāma mahāyakṣasenāpatiḥ |
XXbsu012_u:225: ete dvādaśa mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ ekaikānucaraparivāritā ekakaṇṭhena bhagavantam evam āhuḥ - śrutam asmābhiś ca bhagavatā buddhānubhāvena tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyam |
XXbsu012_u:228: te vayaṃ sahitāḥ samagrā yāvajjīvaṃ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ
XXbsu012_u:229: gacchāmaḥ, dharmaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmaḥ, saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmaḥ |
XXbsu012_u:230: sarvasattvānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya autsukyaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ |
XXbsu012_u:231: yo viśeṣeṇa grāme vā (BhgSū, Vaidya 173) nagare vā janapade vā araṇyāyatene vā edaṃ sūtraṃ pracārayiṣyati, yo vā tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyati, pūjopasthānaṃ
XXbsu012_u:232: kariṣyati, tāvat taṃ sattvaṃ rakṣiṣyāmaḥ, paripālayiṣyamaḥ, sarvāmāṅgalyāc ca parimocayiṣyāmaḥ, sarva eṣām āśāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmaḥ |
XXbsu012_u:233: atha khalu bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ yakṣasenāpatīnāṃ sādhukāram adāt - sādhu sādhu mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ, yad yūyaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya kṛtajñatām anusmaramāṇānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ hitāya pratipannāḥ ||
XXbsu012_u:234: athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat - ko nāmāyaṃ bhagavan
XXbsu012_u:235: dharmaparyāyaḥ? kathaṃ cainaṃ dhārayāmi? bhagavān āha - tena hi ānanda
XXbsu012_u:236: dharmaparyāyam idaṃ bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistaram iti dhāraya, dvādaśānāṃ mahāyakṣasenāpatīnāṃ praṇidhānam iti dhāraya ||
XXbsu012_u:238: āttamanā mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ, āyuṣmāṃś ca ānandaḥ, trāṇamukto bodhisattvaḥ, te ca bodhisattvāḥ, te ca mahāśrāvakāḥ,
XXbsu012_u:240: sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan ||
